TopicTitle: Get KSP on Steam for 40% off This Weekend

Articles.Content:
<p><a href="http://bit.ly/17VRedO"><img src="http://media.tumblr.com/6de38383df395336bf48ed58e58e1314/tumblr_inline_mw9oe2TaVy1rr2wit.jpg"/></a></p>

<p>Are there discounts in space? Why yes there are! Get <em><strong>Kerbal Space Program</strong></em> for <strong>40% off</strong> in the <a href="http://bit.ly/17wvuVl"><strong>Steam Store</strong></a> through <strong>November 18 at 10 AM PST</strong>.</p>

Why yes there are!

I found a grammatic error in a Squad post! I can die happy :-D

Also, hooray!
